mapper.insert: insert into tb_sys_user (username, password, tenant_id, status, gender, mobile_phone, email, login_time, login_attempts, locked_time, password_update_time, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{tenantId}, #{status}, #{gender}, #{mobilePhone}, #{email}, #{loginTime}, #{loginAttempts}, #{lockedTime}, #{passwordUpdateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

update.foreach: UPDATE tb_sys_user SET status = #{item.status}, login_attempts = #{item.loginAttempts}, locked_time = #{item.lockedTime}, update_time = #{item.updateTime} WHERE id = #{item.Id}
